servinfo.title: Clutch Cover, Clutch Disc and Flywheel Inspection

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Clutch Cover, Clutch Disc and Flywheel Removal and Installation

servinfosub.title: Input Shaft Bearing
servinfosub.ptxt: Check bearing for smooth rotation and replace it if abnormality is found.

servinfosub.title: Clutch Disc
servinfosub.ptxt: Measure depth of rivet head depression, i.e. distance between rivet head and facing surface. If depression is found to have reached service limit at any of holes, replace disc assembly.

servinfosub.title: Clutch Cover

item.ptxt: Check diaphragm spring for abnormal wear or damage.
Inspect pressure plate for wear or heat spots.

servinfosub.ptxt: If abnormality is found, replace it as assembly. Do not disassemble it into diaphragm and pressure plate.

servinfosub.title: Flywheel
servinfosub.ptxt: Check surface contacting clutch disc for abnormal wear or heat spots. Replace or repair as required.
